title: LOCK_GRABBING Operation
description: Locks a specified number of grabbing appendages on an actor, optionally associating them with a held item.

actor_id.description: The ID of the actor whose appendages to lock

count.description: Number of grabbing appendages to lock (integer or template string)

item_id.description: Optional: The ID of the item being held. Will be stored in heldItemId on locked appendages.
